title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps Ollama’s REST API for chat, generate, embed, pull, and list operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client published on npm for browser, Node, and Bun environments.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama chat, embeddings, and tool-calling components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, and RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing sync/async APIs, streaming, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST endpoints.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat requests to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal PyQt desktop GUI to chat with any Ollama model without terminal.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with persistent chat sessions, markdown rendering, and model switching.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for fine-tuning, tool use, voice chat, and Docker deployment patterns.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor, and chat with code using Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem exposing Ollama API with native streaming and ActiveRecord-like syntax.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images with CUDA, ROCm, and CPU variants for headless server deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit app demonstrating retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-sd-webui
summary: Extension for AUTOMATIC1111 Stable Diffusion WebUI to generate prompts using Ollama LLMs.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat endpoints, admin UI, and async task queues via Celery.
